UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial and detoxifying activity of NZ17074 analogues with multi-layers of selective antimicrobial actions against Escherichia coli and Salmonella enteritidis.
Literature.Author: Yang N, Liu X, Teng D, Li Z, Wang X, Mao R, Hao Y, Wang J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CVCC 195(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli CVCC 1515(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7 CICC 21530(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CVCC 3377(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1789(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum CVCC 1802(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CVCC 503(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 10419(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2µg/ml),Streptococcus suis CVCC 606(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium CMCC 1.2136(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=4µg/ml),Listeria ivanovii ATCC 19119(no activity data),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2411(no activity data)
